import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products" const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId); return<> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} ; }; export default ProductScreen;
